title: London Police Conduct "Controlled Explosion" Outside US Embassy
content: UK police said Friday officers had carried out a controlled explosion after "a suspicious package" was found outside the United States embassy in London.
summary: UK police said Friday officers had carried out a controlled explosion after "a suspicious package" was found outside the United States embassy in London.

title: Iraq To Afghanistan: How Women's Basic Rights Are Being Eroded Across World
content: From Iraq to Afghanistan to the US, basic freedoms for women are being eroded as governments start rolling back existing laws.
summary: From Iraq to Afghanistan to the US, basic freedoms for women are being eroded as governments start rolling back existing laws.

title: Netanyahu Says World Court Warrant Won't Stop Israel Defending Itself
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday that an arrest warrant issued against him by the International Criminal Court over his conduct of the Gaza war would not stop him defending Israel.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday that an arrest warrant issued against him by the International Criminal Court over his conduct of the Gaza war would not stop him defending Israel.

title: Rare 'Doomsday Fish' Washes Up On California Beach, Fascinates Scientists

title: Russia Gave North Korea Anti-Air Missiles In Exchange Of Troops: S Korea
content: Russia gave North Korea anti-air missiles in exchange for deploying troops to support Moscow's war in Ukraine, Seoul's top security advisor said Friday.

title: Storm Bert: Warning Issued For Heavy Snow, Rain And Travel Chaos In UK

title: Explained: What World Court's Arrest Warrant For Netanyahu Means
content: The International Criminal Court (ICC) has issued an arrest warrant for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, citing "reasonable grounds" for his criminal responsibility for war crimes and crimes against humanity in Gaza.
summary: The International Criminal Court (ICC) has issued an arrest warrant for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, citing "reasonable grounds" for his criminal responsibility for war crimes and crimes against humanity in Gaza.

title: Chimps Are Upping Their Tool Game. Why It Holds Relevance For Humans
content: Chimpanzees are steadily honing their tool-using skills -- a process unfolding over millennia, driven by the exchange of ideas through migrations between populations.

title: "World War 3 Has Begun": Ukraine Ex-Military Commander Amid Russia Conflict
content: Valery Zaluzhny, former military Commander-in-Chief of Ukraine, believes World War III is underway, adding the direct involvement of Russian allies in the conflict indicates the same.

title: Lion, Bears, Cockatoos: Vladimir Putin's "Gifts" To Kim Jong's North Korea
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has sent more than 70 animals, including an African lion, brown bears, and cockatoos, to Pyongyang, in a gesture showing the growing ties between Russia and North Korea.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin has sent more than 70 animals, including an African lion, brown bears, and cockatoos, to Pyongyang, in a gesture showing the growing ties between Russia and North Korea.

title: This Is What King Charles Coronation Cost UK Taxpayers
content: King Charles III's coronation last year cost British taxpayers 72 million pounds ($90.7 million), official accounts released late Thursday revealed.

title: Who Is Pam Bondi, Trump's Choice For Top Lawyer After Matt Gaetz Withdrawal
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Pam Bondi as the country's next attorney general. The Thursday announcement came after firebrand Rep. Matt Gaetz's withdrawal from consideration amid allegations of sexual misconduct.
